messages.subject: Re: learning, doing and gratitude
messages.msgSnippet: ... This little snippet gets better and better to me.  I really think you are not only on to something very, very, cool, but you have probably started
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:

---- "For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them." ~Aristotle

---This reminded me of Holly's experiences at Stems. Thank you again, Katie, for giving her this chance to learn things that can only be learned by doing.


This little snippet gets better and better to me. I really think you are not only on to something very, very, cool, but you have probably started something as well (besides all the other stuff :)) I love all the chances to ask "why not?"

Cindy

messages.subject: learning, doing and gratitude
messages.msgSnippet: Yesterday the quote on Leslie Buchanan s quote of the week list Quoteoftheweek@yahoogroups.com inspired me to write a thank you letter to Holly s flower-shop
messages.messageBody:
Yesterday the quote on Leslie Buchanan's quote of the week list Quoteoftheweek@yahoogroups.com
inspired me to write a thank you letter to Holly's flower-shop mentor,
the owner of Stems. I wanted to share the response with this list.



Subject: learning, doing and gratitude
From: Sandra@...
Date: April 21, 2009 10:49:51 AM MDT
To: Katie Rich...

Someone sent this quote out today:

"For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by
doing them."
~Aristotle

This reminded me of Holly's experiences at Stems. Thank you again,
Katie, for giving her this chance to learn things that can only be
learned by doing.

Sandra

--------------------------------

From: katie@
Subject: RE: learning, doing and gratitude
Date: April 21, 2009 2:01:25 PM MDT
To: Sandra@...

Sandra,

Debbie and I were just talking about how the only way to learn is by
DOING! We really appreciate Holly. :-) She has a lovely personality
too!

Katie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
